        Message From
        Speaker Anthony Rendon

        Welcome to the California State Assembly’s homepage. If you would like to contact your legislator, read about bills, or learn about the Capitol, this is the place.

        There are also links to several other sites you may find useful as well. Remember, we're here to represent you. So I hope you will let us know your thoughts — on legislation, issues, or even how this site can be improved.

        Thanks for visiting.
